about_the_game:
Welcome to the next exciting chapter of Pirate Jam - the Space DLC!

Having successfully navigated the crowded harbours, our brave pirate now embarks on a cosmic quest across the stars! Pirate Jam's Space DLC invites you on an adventure that transcends earthly boundaries, taking you into the vastness of space with challenges that are out of this world.

Galactic puzzles and stellar strategy

Prepare to tackle 10 new levels, each set in the boundless vastness of the cosmos. These aren't just any puzzles; they're meticulously designed to challenge even the most experienced space strategist. Navigate treacherous black holes that warp and twist your path, dodge rapid-fire laser blasts and deftly evade missiles that threaten your journey through the stars.

A new dimension of complexity

The Space DLC takes Pirate Jam to new levels of difficulty. Each level is designed to be more challenging than the last, requiring precise manoeuvring and forward-thinking strategy. You'll need to stay one step ahead and predict the celestial currents to overcome these interstellar challenges.

Immerse yourself in celestial adventure

The void of space is filled with the harmonies of new, exclusive space-themed shanties, setting the mood for your stellar journey. Coupled with stunning cosmic visuals, every moment in the Space DLC is designed to captivate and engage, ensuring an immersive gaming experience.

Master the unknown

Are you ready to chart your course through these cosmic challenges? The Space DLC isn't just about solving puzzles, it's about proving your mettle as a master of the stars. Whether it's the event horizon of a black hole or a barrage of space debris, each obstacle is a test of your skill and resolve.

Prepare to launch into the unknown with Pirate Jam's Space DLC. The universe is waiting to be conquered - are you up to the challenge?

name: Pirate Jam - Space DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Embark on a cosmic puzzle adventure in Pirate Jam's Space DLC! Navigate treacherous black holes and dodge interstellar threats in 10 challenging new levels. Experience advanced space strategy and outwit the universe in this unique, celestial journey.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Finnish, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Ukrainian, Estonian
